( Carnage: This will be Carnage's REAL post and I.R., please do not feel too bad. I really do not care about that incident, in plain...I forgive you.)

* Carnage looked back into the sky, it had been so strange to have those three bots around then retreat away.
But now Icedemon( if this is spelled wrong then please notify me) was back and asking for some disc from Teltoli. She replaced her weapon in her back compartment and then looked at Teltoli, she didn't care what anybot said...she didn't like the Alliance!
She crossed her arms and kept a close optic on Icedemon, she just had a bad feeling every time she was around them.*
